input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
there were many beautiful statues there .
i had time to look at all of them .
output.sentences: This weekend lets hop on a trolley and have a mini vacation.
We could go see the beautiful statues in the city.
Time is ticking by like a woman with a dagger.
The sights are impressive and exciting.
Our souvenirs will be the clothes that we bought.
